title: Vampire Knight: Guilty
synopsis: When the missing Zero Kiryuu returns to Cross Academy, Yuuki Cross is relieved to see him safe, but finds that Zero has changed in more ways than one. As a result of choices he made, Zero is plagued by visions, and he seeks to uncover the reason behind themâ€”unaware that the answers may be much closer than he thinks.
